short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show English definitions of Korean words when hovering over them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Korean Word Lookup - Enhance Your Korean Language Learning

Korean Word Lookup is a Chrome extension designed to assist you in learning Korean by providing instant translations and definitions of Korean words as you browse the web.

Key Features and Benefits:

üìç Instant Translation and Definition
- Hover over Korean words to see their English translations.
- Choose between Google Translate for quick translations and Korean Dictionary for detailed definitions.
- View comprehensive word definitions and examples.

üìç User-Friendly Interface
- Simple toggle to enable or disable translation.
- Easy selection between translation sources.
- Clear and concise tooltip display.

üìç Keyboard Shortcuts
- Alt+T - Toggle translation on/off.
- Alt+G - Switch to Google Translate.
- Alt+K - Switch to Korean Dictionary.

üìç Personalization
- Save your preferred translation source.
- Automatic state saving between sessions.

Technical Features:
- Utilizes Google Translate and Korean Dictionary APIs.
- Secure data storage using Chrome Storage API.
- Responsive design with jQuery.
- Localization support for multiple languages.

FAQ:
Q: How do I enable the translation feature?
A: Click the extension icon and toggle the switch to enable translation.

Q: Can I switch between translation sources?
A: Yes, you can choose between Google Translate and Korean Dictionary in the popup.

Q: Is my data private?
A: Yes, all your data is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to external servers.

Q: Are my settings saved between sessions?
A: Yes, your translation source and toggle state are automatically saved.

Planned Future Updates:
- Support for additional languages.
- Enhanced dictionary features.
- Dark mode support.
- Improved user interface.

Contact:
For suggestions, feedback, or issues, please contact: skykum2004@gmail.com
